input.sentences: we settled roadside for the start of the parade .
the police started the parade off as they rode in on motorcycles .
they were followed by the military | as they carried flags in .
there were some neat costumes in this parade .
the marching band also showed off their talents .
output.sentences: The parade was about to start so the people settled in along the roadside.
The police rode in their motorcycles and started off the parade.
The people waved and smiled proudly as the military carried their flags and marched by.
There were so many neat costumes in the parade.
Parades always showcase many talents but everyone's favorite is always the marching band.
